title: Former Rep. Doug Collins (R-GA), The Clock and the Calendar: A Front-Row Look at the Democrats' Obsession with Donald Trump
description:
Former Congressman Doug Collins (R-GA) reflects on the events leading up to the first impeachment of former President Donald Trump. He's interviewed by Congressman Ken Buck (R-CO). 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
